See also: familie

German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

Borrowed from Latin familia, from famula (“female servant”).

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /faˈmiːliə/
  • audio
    		(file)

Noun[edit]

Familie f (genitive Familie, plural Familien)

  1. family

Declension[edit]

Declension of Familie
singularplural
indef.def.noundef.noun
nominativeeinedieFamiliedieFamilien
genitiveeinerderFamiliederFamilien
dativeeinerderFamiliedenFamilien
accusativeeinedieFamiliedieFamilien

Compounds[edit]

  • Familienanschluß
  • familienfreundlich
  • Familiengericht
  • Familienname
  • Großfamilie
  • Kernfamilie
  • Kleinfamilie

Related terms[edit]

  • familiär
  • Famulus

Descendants[edit]

  • → Danish: familie
  • → Lower Sorbian: familija
  • → Norwegian: familie
  • → Russian: фамилия (familija)

See also[edit]
